ModMetaData.name: Adeptus Mechanicus: Xenobiologis (Playable Eldar)
ModMetaData.author: Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
V1.5.0.1 Adds plyable WH40k Eldar Requires new start or a faction manager mod to have faction bases on the world map.
This mod includes a compatability patch for the latest version of Combat Extended. Thanks for the assistance Saebbi!
Contents Races: Eldar - Humanlike Wraithguard - Animal/mechanoid
Apparel: Eldar Mesh Armour Eldar Mesh Helmet Eldar Avenger Armour Eldar Avenger Helmet Eldar Ranger Armour Eldar Ranger Helmet Eldar Banshee Armour Eldar Banshee Helmet Eldar Warlock Armour Eldar Warlock Helmet Eldar Rune Armour Eldar Ghost Helmet
Wargear: Grenade Packs (Plasma, Haywire, Melta, Hallucination) Runes (Warding, Wrath, Fortune)
Resources: Wraithbone - a psycho active crafting material used in the almost all Eldar construction Psychic Circuitry - eldar component counterpart Spirit Stones - advanced eldar crafting component, that will eventually be needed for wraithguard/lord construction
